# selectionBackgroundStyle

**Instance Property**

The style applied to the background of selected items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectionBackgroundStyle: NSScrubberSelectionStyle? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which specifies no background decoration.

You can either choose from one of the built-in selection styles ([doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle/outlineOverlay] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle/roundedBackground]), or you can subclass [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubberSelectionStyle] to create your own custom selection style.

## Configuring the selection appearance

- **floatsSelectionViews**: A Boolean value that determines the behavior of the item selection decorations as the scrubber’s selection changes.
- **selectionOverlayStyle**: The style overlaid on selected items.
